data.name: Stasis Valley
data.detailed_description:
AWAKEN A VALLEY FROZEN IN TIME.


Adam is a young man who has experienced a traumatic loss. As he descends into a world in his own mind, he uncovers its secrets, faces the dangers within, and learns how to cope with the grief that came with his loss.

Stasis Valley is a platformer with space-bending mechanics and a unique art style, and is accompanied by a lovely score by Mike Eramo. Players will experience a story about loss, grief, avoidance, and acceptance.
data.about_the_game:
AWAKEN A VALLEY FROZEN IN TIME.


Adam is a young man who has experienced a traumatic loss. As he descends into a world in his own mind, he uncovers its secrets, faces the dangers within, and learns how to cope with the grief that came with his loss.

Stasis Valley is a platformer with space-bending mechanics and a unique art style, and is accompanied by a lovely score by Mike Eramo. Players will experience a story about loss, grief, avoidance, and acceptance.
data.short_description: Stasis Valley is an action-platformer which follows Adam, a young man who descends into a world frozen in time. Uncover its secrets, experience a story about grief, and confront the dangers lurking within the valley.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Graphics: 500 MB video memory
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 16:9 aspect ratio
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Graphics: 2 GB video memory
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 16:9 aspect ratio
